Control Name: SC-7 (9) RESTRICT THREATENING OUTGOING COMMUNICATIONS TRAFFIC
Control Statement: The information system: (a) Detects and denies outgoing communications traffic posing a threat to external information systems; and(b) Audits the identity of internal users associated with denied communications
